articles.title: Emerald Fennell’s ‘Saltburn’ to Open London Film Festival - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Starring Barry Keoghan and Jacob Elordi, the writer-director's follow-up to 'Promising Young Woman,' described as a "very British tale of excess," will get its international premiere on Oct. 4.
articles.content:
The BFI London Film Festival has landed one of the most anticipated British films of the year as its 2023 curtain-raiser.

articles.title: Angus Cloud: Euphoria star's mother says his death was 'not intentional' - BBC
articles.description: Angus Cloud had a "joyful" final day and "did not intend to end his life", the actor's mother says.
articles.content:
The mother of Euphoria actor Angus Cloud, who died last week at the age of 25, has given an insight into his "joyful" final day, and said he "did not intend to end his life".
